attributes.action: Pay benefits in token form/payment card.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The cost of supplying cash benfits is unacceptable, as is the possible use of the funds and it's susceptibility to fraud/misuse. In the pursuit of improved fund management, having a system viable for 21st century technology which monitors that funds are not spent by the recipient on luxuries (which invite them to become comfortable without the need to work)limited spending ability needs to be installed.
Funds paid as credits upon a payment card only accepted at certain reputable outlets would ensure justifiable spending only. 
Citizens of this country are proud of their social security and wish to see the destruction of it by way of mismanagement cease.
